website_summaries.verdict: It doesn't get any simpler. This mascara curler from Vivifast heats up in 7 seconds and curls your lashes in 1 or 2 passes. Just be sure to put your mascara on first and let it dry.
pros: Elongated brush head with curved design
Design protects eyelid from heating unit
Constructed from high thermal conductivity nickel-chromium alloy
cons: May not work as well as traditional lash curler for some

customer_reviews.title: This really works!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this awesome Vivifast electric eyelash curler today! I couldn't wait to try it! I definitely was not disappointed. I absolutely love it! The heat is just the right temperature and feels nice.
customer_reviews.author: LongTimeAmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: not good
customer_reviews.text: this item curled my lashes somewhat but not in a good way. i tried curling my lashes after applying mascara and on a separate occasion before mascara as well and both times it made my lashes very clumpy and spidery....my lashes looked better with mascara alone and i have Asian lashes. i also read the instruction which stated that the heated curler has an auto shut off if not fully charged. i charged it for about 4-6 hours and it still turned off while i was using it. not very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alee

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Definitely works! I was skeptical, but gave it a shot. I love this thing! It definitely works and, added bonus, it has a USB connection, so you don't need to use batteries. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: holds the curl!
customer_reviews.text: Love that it is rechargeable with 2 different heat setting! I have thin flat lashes that never hold the curl and this one works wonders. Last all day. I typically apply a light coat, let it dry, curl, then apply another coat.
customer_reviews.author: thieny

customer_reviews.title: So happy that I finally bought it
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical about this heated eyelash curler but so excited to test it out. As the directions say you use it after u put mascara on. It does the job. It lifts, curls and lasted all day. So happy that I finally bought it. It makes my lashes look extra long.
customer_reviews.author: Izabish

customer_reviews.title: One more thing that will go to the cosmetic graveyard.
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty hot, and uncomfortable that near my eye. It is used after the application of mascara, which leads to clumping. I didn’t notice much curl either. My old fashioned drug store curler with a few seconds of heat from a blow dryer works better.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Wazowski

customer_reviews.title: Tiny and Mighty! Perfect fanned lashes!
customer_reviews.text: Adding this lil beauty buddy to all of my reccomendation lists! The heated eyelash curler by Vivifast is the not only beautiful, but also works! As you can see in the photo my eyelashes are fanned and full of volume! It’s beautiful! I love how quickly it heats and how gentle it is on the lash. It’s easily rechargeable and and very compact. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: cc

customer_reviews.title: This is the best eyelash curler ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using an old type of eyelash curler for years and it finally broke. I looked up eyelash curlers on Amazon thinking I was just going to get the same old type again even though I'm not really a fan of them because they do pinch your eyelids. To my surprise I saw this electric heated eyelash curler! I was skeptical I'll admit at first but after reading a lot of the reviews I decided to try it. I thought "This has to be too good to be true". I am SO glad I ordered this electric heated eyelash curler! It's the best!!! It works great and keeps my eyelashes curled all day!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for crooked, overly curly lashes
customer_reviews.text: I have long, thin, irregularly curly lashes that have been an absolute curse. The ones on the outside edges curl inwards towards my nose, and curlers make it worse. Most heated curlers don't get hot enough to make a difference, but this one does! I comb down from the top and slightly outwards, and it effectively straightens my lashes! Then I sweep up from below like normal and I end up with beautifully flared, normally curved lashes. And it works without mascara on as well as with! Total lifesaver.
customer_reviews.author: Mal A.

customer_reviews.title: Used and broken
customer_reviews.text: The box was opened, the curler itself had a left mascara stain in it indicating it’s been used and it is bent and broken.
customer_reviews.author: RALPH BLEDSAW

customer_reviews.title: time consuming results are unsuccessful
customer_reviews.text: I like the concept of the product though the process was very time consuming and it didnt curly my eyelashes it took my mascara right off & ended up on the product which you can only use the brush provided to clean it and well it didnt clean it. 15seconds or longer holds for it to curl and it shuts after 3 minutes. after it cooled and an unsuccessful attempt to clean it i turned it back and it started to smoke from the heat burning the mascara Utterly frustrated with it
customer_reviews.author: loni johnson

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: I am doing lash lift in my studio and some clients have very strong lashes that I wanted to curl it before the lift in order to make the lashes a little curly to glue it on the silicon shield. I tried this product on myself and on clients, but it never worked.
customer_reviews.author: AysenS

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend even for non mascara users like me
customer_reviews.text: I simply love this item. I cannot wear mascara due to an allergy to it but I got this in hopes of curling the lashes I do have. I was worried it wouldn’t work without mascara but it absolutely does. Heats up quick; curls my lashes quick and my lashes stay curled. If I have to touch up, this is quick since this item heats up in a few seconds!!! I recommend this to anyone who curls their lashes. I could never get those other metal ones to work without mascara or work at all for that matter. I love the heat choices, and since you plug it in, also a huge bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Mariette Hanlon

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t work well
customer_reviews.text: You have to hold it to your eyelashes for 15 seconds and then the curl leaves 5 seconds later
customer_reviews.author: J'Amy

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used yet
customer_reviews.text: This is just a comment. Watched the video before using the curler and the person doing the video has too much eyeliner to be able to see the lashes. A redo without the liner would be very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Discriminate Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Fixed my kinky eyelashes
customer_reviews.text: My eyelashes started to kink on the ends of my left eye, and I could not get them to straighten out. Someone told me to try an electric eyelash curler so I bought this little thing. It’s awesome! Heats up super fast, has a plastic guard so I don’t burn my eyelid, and only needs to charge with a usb every few weeks. I just run it from my lid down my eyelashes for a few seconds and it straightens them right out. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Now I can rock curled lashes!! I was born with stick straight lashes and the regular lash curlers always ended plucking what few lashes I had instead of curling them. Btw, I have straight, short, thin, Asian lashes. This tool plus the maybelline waterproof (because my eyes water) and my lashes stayed curled alllllllll day! Plus it heats up quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Heats up too much
customer_reviews.text: On the lowest heat setting, this heats up too much and causes mascara to melt and become stringy. Danger! And this is meant to be used after mascara application. I have decided to use it prior to mascara application to get the desired curl. Be careful using it though, as this heats up hotter than I would personally like. Works decently otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Funny Nacho

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, very safe
customer_reviews.text: The moment I received this heated eyelash curler, I plugged it in to my computer to charge. I was surprised how easy it is to use. All the reviews I read helped me choose this model. I am very very happy and will be telling my friends about it. My eyelashes are usually very straight so I have had to use a traditional eyelash curler. I don't like using the old fashioned crimp style curler because I loose a lot of lashes. This little device is just perfect. Use mascara that doesn't clump immediately upon applying. Just a thin coat is all you need and the Acavado does the rest. Lasts all day!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kori Pilkington

customer_reviews.title: Heated Eyelash Curler is fast & effective! !
customer_reviews.text: I was really very skeptical when I first saw this product, but after using it only one time I couldn't believe the difference in my eyelashs! They were so much longer it was as if I were wearing false eyelashs! It only takes a second to heat up and after a couple of strokes on your lashes you've got beautiful long eyelashs! I'm very impressed with this and will definitely be getting my family members one for Christmas! !
customer_reviews.author: Lisa's A1 Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! High quality and works well.
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant at first because I recently bought a poor quality electric eyelash curler on Amazon, and it stopped working within a week. This, on the other hand, I can tell that it's very well made the moment I opened the package. It has several features such as heat control, heat indicator light, USB charger, and a cleaning brush. While traditional eyelash curlers do not work on my thin and short eyelashes, this does the trick. It even comes with a 1-year warranty!
customer_reviews.author: SaSa L

customer_reviews.title: No Amazing Results
customer_reviews.text: I’m not really impressed by this curler. I read a couple of other reviews that said this works on straight lashes. It does curl, but doesn’t hold all day. I used a good mascara before and after, followed all directions and tutorials. I even got a lash lift. No dramatic or amazing results here. Maybe I am not as blessed in the eyelash department as others.
customer_reviews.author: ewill

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for me
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this and wanted it to work, but it doesn't. The price was great and a woman at my gym swears by this type. The reviews about heat are pretty spot-on...it's hot, but doesn't burn your eyes (there are two settings and the indicator light was nice). It's easy to use to get close to the root of your eyelash, easy to hold, and instructions are clear. I followed everything I was supposed to, but it wouldn't curl my lashes. I was so disappointed. Maybe if someone had very fine, long lashes? Mine are just normal and it wouldn't do anything to them. I will stick with warming up my regular eyelash curler with the hairdryer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than any mascara wand!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried every mascara possible to make my lashes look the way this curler makes them look! All you need is some cheap Maybelline/Covergirl/Rimmel mascara and this thing does the rest! Absolutely LOVE it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Le Anne

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: This heated lash curler works well. It has 2 different heat settings and heats up quickly. You apply the mascara first and let it dry then push the curler into your lashes, up and back toward the lid and hold it for 15 seconds. It takes a few times on each side to get all lashes. My lashes look nice almost like what I'd think a lash lift would look like. My lashes naturally stick out straight. The only negative is that is seems to shut off on its own after a short time while I'm still using it. For the price, I think it is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Laurette Caliguire

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I had given up on regular-clamp-style eyelash curlers. I had trouble getting my lashes into the clamp, I pinched my lid, the curl didn't last anyhow. WOW what a difference with this no-clamp heated curler!!! And, you use it AFTER you apply your mascara (ever try that with the clamp-style!). It's easy to use, it actually curls my lashes and best part - they stay curled! I'm buying a second one because I travel for work and keep a full second-set of makeup supplies packed. I don't want to leave home without one!
customer_reviews.author: MARLO HALLIDAY

customer_reviews.title: THIS WORKS 100% with your money recommended this 100%
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't to sure about using this electric flash curler,BUT after using it and playing around with I'm I'm sold...It does not get really hot so it's not going to burn you... that was my first thought but it doesn't...my lashes gave a hard time curling and stick straight out when wearing mascara... with this product I put on my mascara then curled my lashes to my surprise they actually curled and stayed...see video on how to use this product...its worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is a very useful little tool to have in your makeup routine. It works as promised. Does NOT get hot enough to burn any skin it touches. I use it BEFORE I apply mascara and it does the job! Super fast and safe. No more eyelid injuries due to traditional eyelash curlers!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Instant curl
customer_reviews.text: I could never find a good eyelash curler that I could use in stores because of the size of my eye. The ones in stores are too big for me so it doesn’t curl efficiently. I tried this out and it worked! It came already charged so I just turned it on and let it heat for a couple of seconds. Comes with a cover which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Dkay

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Did absolutely nothing for my lashes. I had mascara already applied. Used this tool and all it did was melt my mascara and make my lashes cling together.
customer_reviews.author: Jillana

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS THING
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fantastic. I was losing eyelashes that were being ripped out by a traditional eye lash curler. I love this little tool and use it daily. The charge lasts like a week and I clean it with a clean mascara brush immediately after use and the mascara comes right off. I had the white one and wasn’t diligent about cleaning after every use and it didn’t work as well.... when I say clean I mean 1.5 seconds of running the brush of led the medal that heats up where you end up with mascara.m, super easy. Eye lashes stayed curled all day.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny B

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this eyelash curler. It curled my eyelashes so nicely. After about 4 months while I was using the little brush to clean it, half of the white plastic protector piece snapped off. I tried to put it back on but it wouldn’t stay. By the time I thought about checking to see if it could be returned, It was too late to send it back. I tried to use it without that piece but burnt my eyelid a little so I won’t be doing that again. It was a little more expensive than other heated eyelash curlers I’ve purchased so I’m a little disappointed that it didn’t last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Bourne

customer_reviews.title: Good Curler
customer_reviews.text: It takes a bit to get used to, but it's definitely not a BURNING HOT tool as other people here claim it to be. I have extremely thick straight eyelashes, so it doesn't give you a real umph girl, but more of a really subtle natural girl. If that's what you're looking for, this is great. The battery life is also really great, let's be real, how long is a person really using an eyelash curler a day?
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Kim

customer_reviews.title: easy to use, but takes longer than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: Product is a great idea, but takes longer than I'd like, almost not worth the extra time during makeup application. Recommend heat setting #1 unless you are very tolerable to heat, almost burned my eyelids on heat setting #2. Takes 10-12 strokes on the lashes to see the curl results - but I have very thin, straight lashes. Don't feel like I get as good of a curl as some of the reviewers seen on youtube. Glad I got the daily deal, wouldn't have paid full price.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Brown

customer_reviews.title: great eyelash curler
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can recharge this when the battery is low rather than replacing the battery like I used to in my other curler. Such a waste of money as batteries did not last very long. The charge lasts quite a while on this one. It has 2 temperatures but the low one works for me. The only issue is the small cleaning brush that came with it probably won't last that long as there is not much to it. But otherwise, I am very satisfied with it and would recommend it. Works so much better than manual curlers which used to pull out my lashes when I used them.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a nice heated eyelash curler! It is super easy to use, isn’t too hot where it scares you, and really curls your lashes especially when you put mascara on first. I love how the curl is very nice and even compared to using an eyelash curler that often times gives you a crease or folds to get the curl in your eyelash. it is very easy to use and portable as well if you want to take it with you on trips. Can’t wait to continue using this!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: It keeps them curled!
customer_reviews.text: I like this little gadget. I have a routine: I curl my lashes with a regular old curler, apply a couple mascaras, wait for them to dry, and then I use this. It takes only seconds to heat up, and the key is to start close to the base of the lashes (which is weird, because it’s a warm object near your eye, but you get used to it), and slow work your way to the tips. It keeps them curled!
customer_reviews.author: N.N. Bye

customer_reviews.title: Natural all day curl. Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Best curler I've used so far. Curls my lashes perfectly the way i want them. I have very thin lashes so the regular curlers break or pull my ashes out amd not to mention creates a line when curling but not this curler. Just us upward strokes like you are applying mascara and you can see them nicely curling up the direction you brush the lashes. I use it on the bare lashes first then apply a light application of mascara. I only apply one coat and my lashes have a natural curl to them. Lashes stay curled all day. Comes with charger and has 2 heat settings and auto shut off.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Works great for this newbie!
customer_reviews.text: I've always liked having a curl in my lashes, but usually wasn't patient enough to use a regular(manual) eyelash curler. I saw an electric eyelash curler on another site, and after comparing prices and reading a bunch of product reviews, I decided to take a chance on this one, and I'm so glad I did! It heated up super-fast, and was very easy to use from the start. It gave my eyelashes a nice curl with just a few swipes. I'm sold!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: effective curler
customer_reviews.text: Great little eyelash curler that heats up super fast. I find that the low heat setting is more than sufficient. Switching from using a traditional clamp-style curler took some getting used to, but after a few days, I've gotten a handle on how to angle the device to ensure maximum curl. It takes a little longer than the traditional curler because there's no clamp, but the curl comes out a bit more natural as a result.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive, well made, easy to use, does not get too hot. This is more comfortable than the clamp style eyelash curler. I am trying to use serums and take vitamins to take better care of my eyelashes and in that pursuit I have also started using this type of curling iron. It is much more comfortable to use. I am able to hold it against my lashes right up against my water line and it doesn't burn at all. The guard and temperature control make for a nice and comfortable curl.
customer_reviews.author: Katy T

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Waste, Minor difference after several passes, then it faded before I could get the mascara wand out. Doing this after mascara is not smart as it takes most of it off and clumps what’s left. Waste of $$$
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: After Trial and Error Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This curler is amazing! I first tried it after applying mascara (as instructed) but it melted the mascara, no matter which brand I used. Kind of fused the lashes together and made the mascara less, if that makes sense. Then I tried it on bare lashes, didn’t do much. Finally, I tried it again on bare lashes, but while my lashes were still damp (like immediately after) dabbing my eyelids with lid and lash cleanser ( hypochlorus acid) then applied mascara. The results were amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Skeptic but enjoying it now!
customer_reviews.text: Took me a few times to get the hang of it. I have stick straight lashes. I did have to give my lashes a slight curl with my curler beforehand. I did notice though that I do need to apply mascara before using the wand. If I don't my lashes crinkle up. So slight curl with my curler, apply mascara then use wand. Be gentle and take your time. The wand does give my lashes a nice huge curl, slightly melts the mascara to lashes and seals them. They stay curled even during humid weather. *I use maybelline waterproof mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Lau

customer_reviews.title: Works but not as good as a normal curler
customer_reviews.text: It takes forever to curl one eye eyelash. I follow the instruction, applied mascara then curl after mascara is dried. It does give my eyelash a natural lift but too time consuming. I used low heating because the high heat is a little too hot for me. In the picture left eye was curled with this electric device. Right eye was curled using normal eyelash curler. I use Benefit Roller lash curling mascara on both. I think the normal eyelash curler side looks better
customer_reviews.author: Tri Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: It did not curled my eyelashes at all.
customer_reviews.text: It is a straight forward device, easy enough to use. I did not see any difference in my lashes which curve up on their own. I tried it before applying mascara to avoid the mess and saw no difference, but I also tried with a coat of mascara as recommended and still could not see any difference.
customer_reviews.author: Mely Curiel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing electric eyelash curler !!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg I Loooved this eyelash curler!! I have straight eyelashes that no matter how much I curl them with a regular eyelash curler it never worked because a lot of times it pulled my lashes off :( it was a mess until I used this electric eyelash curler !! This heated curler is so easy to use and curls my lashes beautifully. I can’t believe my lashes look so pretty. I'm so happy I found this electric eyelash curler and would recommend to anyone that had struggled curling their lashes or have straight lashes like me !
customer_reviews.author: Marisol C.

customer_reviews.title: another piece of trash for the dumpster fire that is 2020
customer_reviews.text: if i could give this 0 stars I would. Its just a loosely coiled metal wire, coiled around plastic that is weakly heated by a battery. There is 0 power in it to actually curl your lashes. When you swipe up your lashes you have nothing to sort of create a curl against. Like with a traditional curler that has a bottom and a top part pressing your lash to make it bend. You are just risking burning your eyeball. Just do yourself a favor and get eyelash extensions or glue on falsies with the money you could be spending going yo the ER with a singed eyeball
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Great lash curler! Best one I've yet!
customer_reviews.text: This is the updated version of their older one I bought not too long ago.... This version is a great update! It's more ergonomic and there are better features with this one... 1 of which there is a light that shows when it's charging and it's more obvious than the previous one. This update also shows the temperature of the heat which is great! especially for those that are nervous to try it for the first time.. I honestly believe this tool has made my lashes look the longest yet!
customer_reviews.author: warhem

customer_reviews.title: BEST EYELASH CURLER EVER
customer_reviews.text: This is a amazing product!! I have been using the traditional squeeze kind for many years with all the ripping pulling etc, this is so easy, works really well with no eyelash damage, I HIGHLY recommend this from this vendor, they are great and very easy to communicate with
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Anne Walker Pike

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this curler for 1 month now. It’s a complete game changer. I’m tossing the traditional curler out! The secret is too sweep it from the lash roots upwards very slowly. I keep it at the lash base for about 4-5 seconds to give my lashes the lift they need. It also works great on my bottom lashes too. I always have a couple of bottom lashes that stick straight out.
customer_reviews.author: One cat away from crazy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Great for short lashes or small eyes too. Easy to use, start at base of lashes and swipe up slowly while stopping to hold wand near end of lashes to really get it curled and lifted. No more tugging or pulling lashes, I thre my old curler out. Bought these for my girls too.
customer_reviews.author: anne wirths

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to try this. It heats up well, great size easy to hang onto and is very simple to use but I honestly don’t see much of a difference when I use it. Maybe I was expecting to much. I can see a little lift in my lashes but definitely doesn’t give them a nice curl like I was hoping it would.
customer_reviews.author: DZ85

customer_reviews.title: Saves Your Lashes!
customer_reviews.text: This product saved my lashes. Stopped using the squeeze type crimper and switched to this lash curler. Within one month noticed my lashes were filling back in and now my lashes are healthy and long. There is a slight learning curve but it’s worth the switch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really does work
customer_reviews.text: As some, I was skeptical. I always use a regular closed curler that I heat with a flame or hair dryer. I always lose lashes. This one, is great. I keep it on low and it's fine. I have stick straight lashes so I use on clean lashes, then apply mascara, wait and curl them again. Works great and doesn't pull out my lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This heats up so fast and it really curls your lashes. Make sure to put mascara on first and let it dry before using. I highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Jessy Molina

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I discovered heated lash curlers after years of using the traditional pinch and squeeze kind & fell in love immediately. When I saw this new style of heated curler I was really excited to try it. Unfortunately, I was very disappointed :( Though it dotes get very warm, it does almost nothing for shaping/curling the lashes. I worked suggest trying the heated pinch curler instead.
customer_reviews.author: Kohnke family

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: This thing is useless. I gave it multiple chances and I followed the directions exactly and even read the amazon reviews for tips but it doesn’t do anything.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I grew my brows using Rapid Lash, but it also made my lashes grow too. They wouldn't stay curled anymore, kept falling down flat. I didn't want to have to get them permed, so I bought this instead & am so happy that I did. It works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Really does curl your eyelashes.
customer_reviews.text: I love love this eyelash curler. At first I was very skeptical but when I used it it really does curl your eyelashes. Whoever made this is a genius person!
customer_reviews.author: Elena Ratcliff

customer_reviews.title: Like a mini hair iron for your lashes
customer_reviews.text: So I was skeptical about this but I gave it a shot and I’m really glad I did. I really like it. It’s like a hair iron for your lashes. It doesn’t over heat and doesn’t burn your lash hair. It gives your lashes a look that you get with fake lashes
customer_reviews.author: Raja salar

customer_reviews.title: Worth It!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure this would work, but all the positive reviews had me intrigued. Turns out it works well!!! It’s so simple and much safer and less damaging than the ones that crimp your lashes. I love this thing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mennen22

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for long lashes
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this lash curler! I have ALWAYS hated the traditional lash curler because I always feel like I’m going to pull out my clients lashes and this definitely is more comfortable for me and them. I also feel with natural long lashes you get a better result with this hearted curler as opposed to a regular lash curler.
customer_reviews.author: Shaina J.

customer_reviews.title: curler
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to train my lashes to stop curling inward. When I use it regularly, it works. I like not having to crimp and break my lashes any more. At my age, they don't grow back as quickly. Recommend giving this a try.
customer_reviews.author: F. Gast

customer_reviews.title: This is a Godsend product! Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I have seen the similar product on facebook and wanted to give it a try but I feel dubious in ordering things on facebook so I searched for the similar product in Amazon and I was so in awe!!! I am so impressed on how its easy to use, it lifts my lashes beautifully making my eyes so wide awake! You can see the attached photos. I can honestly say that this is Godsend! And my lashes stayed lifted all day without needing to retouch. I couldn't be more happier that I purchased this product! Highly recommended y'all!! ♥️♥️
customer_reviews.author: Heinrich Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Lash Curler!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great product!! From all the times I've used it, I've only had to charge it once. The heat is not so bad that it burns my lid. I love how well it curls my lashes. I love that they last curled all day long!!! You get better results when you curl them with this after applying mascara, by the way :-)
customer_reviews.author: MCV

customer_reviews.title: Eyelash Curler Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Really love your eyelash curler. It gets hot and makes my eyelashes pop. Would recommend to anyone who is looking for one. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: JoAnne

customer_reviews.title: Eye opener!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I used to use a traditional eyelash curler, this opens my eyes up better. I feel the curl lasts longer. I use it before mascara, just takes a bit longer, but I like the look better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So-so
customer_reviews.text: This heated eyelash curler is just okay. Maybe it’s marginally better than a standard curler but I honestly don’t see much difference. This one does heat up in record time and the charging port is very convenient, charge holds for quite a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I use it with my sephora eye lash curler using the C-curling technique. Heat up the lashes with this then seal the curl with a traditional curler. Same concept as you would curling your hair. My lashes look fuller since I'm able to curl the corners of each eye.
customer_reviews.author: N.H.

customer_reviews.title: Glad I tried this
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always wanted to try a heated lash curler and I’m glad I did. This one is quick and easy to use, warms up quickly and isn’t too hot. The charger is a usb, so no batteries needed. My lashes are super short, but this product gave them a little lift. I’m sure if my lashes were much longer it would still do the trick. The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is because you need to clean it after every use and mascara gets stuck in the center, but they give you a little brush to comb it out.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: A Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I was not able to get my lashes to curl with this product. I watched a video, read the directions and tried it many times.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Q. Strawn

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Not worth buying. Doesn’t work. Makes your lashes clump together.
customer_reviews.author: dkohl

customer_reviews.title: May work for some, does not work for me
customer_reviews.text: Great looking product but it just doesn’t work for me. Maybe it’s the amount of mascara I wear, I wear very little but I just cannot get this device to curl my lashes. No difference at all.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Ann Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Does nothing to my eyelashes. And when I use it after I put on mascara like the directions say to it gets clumpy and gross.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: I buy with a healthy amount of skepticism when it comes to promises about my measly eyelashes, but this exceeded my expectations. Not only was it shipped fast, but this curls my lashes better than any curler I have ever used!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Hoppenjans

customer_reviews.title: The Best Lash Curler!
customer_reviews.text: This is soooo AMAZING!! I absolutely love it! It lifts and curls your lashes perfectly! You dont need a clamping device!! It works effortlessly and helps separate your lashes! I highly recommend this over the clamping tool by far!! It doesnt damage your lashes like the clamping tools can and pull them out. This is safe and feels nice also. Definitely a must have makeup tool!!
customer_reviews.author: Topaz Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Works better than any other heated eyelash curler I’ve tried... And unfortunately I’ve lost money on a few. Make sure your mascara is pretty dry first. Are use a toothpick to get rid of any clumps. It takes a little while to learn the technique but just keep going. So good. Game changer.
customer_reviews.author: Fiana Anderson

customer_reviews.title: breaks pretty quickly
customer_reviews.text: This was great, until it stopped heating up, which was just outside of the return window. My last heat curler lasted for over a decade and it was super cheaply made. Off to find something else.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Giblin

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: This is ok. It heats up pretty quickly but, had a bit of a smell to it. I didn't see a big difference even after several attempts.
customer_reviews.author: cchamp

customer_reviews.title: A little extra curl makes it worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: While I was skeptical, it definitely makes a difference compared to my regular eyelash curler. A little difference makes enough of an impact to be worth the investment. At times, I’ve used my hair dryer to heat up my eyelash curler, but this is easier and it doesn’t come with the burden of an overheated regular eyelash curler.
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: Fragile Tip
customer_reviews.text: I love this curler, straight Asian eyelashes can never curl with regular curlers but this heated one really allows the curves to stay for a day. However, the white plastic tip/cage part that surrounds the heated metal part opens up by itself after about 2 weeks of use and even if I protect it with the cap, it's very fragile. The backside broke off in the middle. I'm still using it but it's more dangerous now. Maybe this is something to look into fixing for a new model?
customer_reviews.author: Amy Chiang

customer_reviews.title: Too Much Time for Clean-Up
customer_reviews.text: This might work for some people, but it didn't work for me. A friend of mine recommended this heated lash curler and since I've gotten it, I have tried to give it a fair shot. Overall, I'd say that I spent more time cleaning the curler after using it then using it to curl my lashes. I used it according to the directions and didn't really see a difference from my normal lash position. Also, it made my lashes clumped together and look more spidery, which I don't like. This product isn't something that I could easily incorporate in my daily routine so I'm planning to either return or get rid of it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Forer

customer_reviews.title: Useful device
customer_reviews.text: It curls my eyelashes easily, even without using mascara. It is warm but not hot and does not burn. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy Brad

customer_reviews.title: It's Ok
customer_reviews.text: After Reading all the bad reviews I didn't have great expectations, still I wanted to try it because I wanted to find an option to curl my eyelashes. If you have long eyelashes it does work, it doesn't curl them amazinlgy, don't expect a super curly effect but it works for natural curled looking eyelashes. I can see why it wouldn't work for very short lashes though.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: The curl doesn’t last!
customer_reviews.text: The item did heat up but did not work on my eyelashes at all. It did get quite hot but the curl did not last. I spent 30 minutes no joke on trying to curl one eye and it ended up falling flat like I had done nothing to it by the time I left the house. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: C. C.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: The product doesn't work. Also, first you have to put on mascara and let that dry and THEN "curl". You're actually just molding the mascara. Even at that, however, it only lasts a minute. WASTE OF MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great curler
customer_reviews.text: Love this curler. Have tried many different kinds. This one is by far my favorite. Hold a charge for a long time. Nice that it has 2 settings.
customer_reviews.author: opel02

customer_reviews.title: Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: This heated eyelash curler really works! It is important to note that using the right mascara helps keep the curl all day & night. I am using Dior Show. I still use a regular eyelash curler before putting on mascara & use the heat curler at the end to give you beautiful curls. If you are using a 4D mascara, it doesn’t work as well. My cap is missing from the product, but I contacted the vendor & they said they’re mailing one to me.
customer_reviews.author: Smart Shopper

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first. But I figured why not try. I've been using the clamp curler for years 35 years probably and never happy with it. My curl doesn't hold. It holds all day with this electric one! I'm sold!
customer_reviews.author: BRdurham

customer_reviews.title: Finally something works!
customer_reviews.text: This thing actually curls your eyelashes! It make take some time to do it but it does work. The heat is not too hot and feels nice. I have been showing all my friends!
customer_reviews.author: erica

customer_reviews.title: Cool product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my mom and I, and we both love it! No lashes are falling off, and the heat setting is good (there are two), my mom loves it so much she wants me to purchase more for her friends in Korea. You have to apply mascara first and let it dry before using the product. It also comes with a cleaning brush so that you can keep it nice and clean after each use. It is very easy to use and they give you a free gift after your purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Inhyuk Oh

customer_reviews.title: YASSS
customer_reviews.text: Put it on the charger for a little bit. USE MASCARA ON YOUR EYELASHES FIRST. Then once the mascara has dried, put the curler at the base of your eyelashes slowly moving up & moving back & forth at the same time. THIS WORKS. I was skeptical. But I used it once & I was very impressed... but the comb that goes with it! WORTH IT.
customer_reviews.author: cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: I Love Danger
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Be careful! If you don't pay attention, you'll burn your freaking eyelid off. Other than the danger, which is kind of exciting, it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jester

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: First of all, My eyelashes are straight. I do NOT wear mascara. I tried this item multiple times to give it a fair shake. It does not deliver it’s promise. It did make some sort of impression on my lashes after about 4-5 times of attempting to curl my lashes slowly, letting the heat really get into the lashes. Did not curl. Again - I do not wear mascara. I read you should apply that first before curling, but isn’t that super messy? Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie M. Staley

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Most-effective, in my opinion, after mascara has been applied and fully-dried. Adds a nice lift with slight curl (depending how you use it). Less damaging than manual lash-curlers, and definitely the best heated lash-curler I’ve used. I like that it plugs-in to charge, has decent battery life, no need to use/buy batteries. Good amount of heat, quality product
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Bae

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work very well
customer_reviews.text: It is supposed to have two heat options, but that feature doesn't work. It only has one heat option. It really doesn't curl lashes very well and the curl doesn't stay very long. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: B. Boop

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely amazing and I’m so happy I got it. The after effect on my eyes are amazing. I’m so happy I gave it a chance.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Sigler

customer_reviews.title: Bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very upset after all the reviews I read I decided to buy this and it does not curl very well at all. I tried with mascara and without, did not give me any curl.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: You’ll be happy
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with this purchase. Does exactly what it’s suppose to and lasts all day. I bought one for my teenage girls and they love it also! Would definitely recommend too anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tenille

product_meta.title: Heated Eyelash Curler, Acavado Electric Eyelash Curler Electronic Eye Lashes Curling Comb Quick Heating Long Lasting USB Rechargeable Natural
feature_bullets: Ⓥ【Heat-up in 7 Seconds】Made of high thermal conductivity of nickel-chromium alloy, eyelash curler heats up super quick and quite hot. Sturdy and long lasting. Note: If in your place the weather is too cold, pls allow it more time to get pre-heated

Ⓥ【Large Heat Release】 Two temperature adjustments: one is 45-65 ℃, another is 65-85 ℃, practically fit for different occasions. The heat is what makes this curler amazing at producing dramatically swept-up curls in record time. You can sweep your lashes up to a gorgeous curve in one or two slow swoops

Ⓥ【Over-temperature Protection】 Strip insulation groove design, much safer to protect your eyelid from the heating unit. Note: Pls let your mascara get dry enough, then use our heated eyelash curler to curl, or mascara would be easily removed.

Ⓥ【Elongated Brush Head with Curved Design】 The deep, well-spaced grooves make it easy to hold your lashes in place as you gently bend them upwards, better fit lashes arc, create a long lasting and graceful curling effect

Ⓥ【Decent Battery Life & Reliable After-sales Service】 3.7V lithium battery power supply, USB charging of cycle use, portable and more environmentally friendly; We offer 1 year satisfactory after-sale service, if you have any issues about the products, feel free to contact us

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
